main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted on June 14, 1958, in Pueblo, Colorado, while a civilian was driving north.
interesting points: The object was described as flat with a rounded dome and shining appearance,The object was white or silvery and higher than cirrus clouds at approximately 30,000 feet,It was observed using a theodolite and was measured visually and aurally,The speed was estimated at about 2000 feet per second over a distance of approximately 15 miles in 3 minutes,The object made no sound and had no visible means of propulsion or exhaust.
sighted object: a flat, shining object with a rounded dome
